@enduringscreens @_vonarchimboldi A film like KAALA, for example, which freely mixes Tamil, Hindi, Marathi and English, especially its musical numbers (which is even more significant), is a frontal attack on language purists (which often maps to caste supremacists). Its cosmopolitanism is a progressive force.
